command.name: test-concept-enhanced
command.description: Coordinate test analysis workflow using cli-execution-agent to generate test strategy via Gemini

intent.primary_user_value: Generate actionable test generation strategy and requirements from a test-context package using Gemini via cli-execution-agent.

must_not: No code generation or codebase modifications (strategy/planning only).
Do not claim pointers are Existing unless verifiable in the repo.

p0: Frontmatter includes name, description, argument-hint, allowed-tools (and group if used).
Produces or verifies expected outputs: gemini-test-analysis.md and TEST_ANALYSIS_RESULTS.md.
Evidence tables (if present) pass verify-evidence.js gates (docs + TS anchors).
